            Lore Abad
          
          
            
              I am a researcher with a background in environmental engineering and geospatial technologies. R is my go-to coding language for most of my data science and visualization tasks as well as scientific report and article writing. This blog is meant to share some tip and tricks I have learned along the way. You can reach me at any of the links below!
